resources.string: Click \"Backup Data\" to tell Random Name Picker where you want it to back up your data and have it start doing regular backups!
To backup your name list, we need access to your storage.
Navigate to the folder where you want Random Name Picker to backup your data.
We failed to back up your data.
Click \"Restore Data\" to tell Random Name Picker where your data backup file is and have it restore your name list!
